p.p: Write MATLAB code that assigns the value 80 to the variable NucleotidesPerTurn, and 'green' to the variable chlorophyll

codeparam.grader_payload: %api_key=SolsRMsNeis %% assert(~isempty(whos('NucleotidesPerTurn')), 'You must create a variable ''NucleotidesPerTurn''') %% assert(isequal(NucleotidesPerTurn, 80), 'The variable fingerCount should contain the value 5') assert(~isempty(whos('chlorophyll')), 'You must create a variable ''chlorophyll''') %% assert(strcmp(chlorophyll,'green'), 'The variable sky should contain the value ''green''') %%
